title: OPUS Echo of Starsong Deluxe Edition
description: Echo of Starsong is a visual novel style adventure game. Eda, a girl who can hear mysterious sound waves known as starsong, crosses paths with a young man in search of their source. Together, they venture out to the heart of space to unravel an ancient myth.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ｜REVIEWS & ACCOLADES｜
<!--text-->
“Opus: Echo of Starsong is a serious contender for my game of the year.” - Kotaku

“Imagine 80 Days by way of Dune and a Makoto Shinkai film” - Rock Paper Shotgun

“OPUS: Echo of Starsong makes the most of every moment of the player's time, rounding out into an breathtaking intergalactic experience that adventure game and visual novel lovers shouldn't miss.”
9.5/10 - KeenGamer

"I firmly believe that OPUS: Echo of Starsong is one of the best indie games of 2021. It has set the standard of narrative writing and music for indie games as a whole."
9/10 - GameBraves
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-htjuw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-htjuw.png)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ｜ABOUT THIS GAME｜
<!--text-->
Echo of Starsong is a visual novel style adventure game. Asteroids emitting a sound known as "Starsongs" have become the center of conflict for the immense power they hold. Determined to claim asteroids of his own, a young man ventures out with a girl who can imitate starsongs, lending her voice to unravel an ancient myth deep in the heart of space.
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-fyx0w](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-fyx0w.gif)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Seek Out The Elusive Asteroids
<!--text-->
The female protagonist - Eda, can hear the thunderous sound of starsongs in space, and navigate their spaceship towards the asteroid it came from.
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-d42n2](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-d42n2.gif)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unravel The Mystery Of Starsongs
<!--text-->
The male protagonist - Jun, can explore asteroids to locate the starsong's source, which reside in magnificant temples deep within the asteroids, hiding their ancient secrets.
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-u8bfe](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-u8bfe.gif)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Engage With A Colorful Cast Of Characters
<!--text-->
Throughout their journey, the crew will encounter people of all sorts. From starsong intel brokers, to asteroid excavation enforcement officers. Some may act as an obstacle, while others will prove themselves to be allies.
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-1aqmo](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-1aqmo.gif)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Learn About Each Character's Past
<!--text-->
Most people of Thousand Peaks have a personal story to tell when it comes to the conflicts that have ravaged their homeland. Uncover the troubled history of this solar system as you get to know each character.
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-oy8jx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-oy8jx.gif)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Travel Across A Lawless Solar System
<!--text-->
The story's main setting, Thousand Peaks, has been in a state of chaos ever since the war. Help the crew travel through the territories of different factions, as they gather intel on the fabled starsongs.
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-1fsz2](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-1fsz2.gif)
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Enjoy The Story At Your Own Pace
<!--text-->
Echo of Starsong is a narrative-driven game. Although light puzzles and resource management are involved throughout the story, gameplay is kept simple to provide an accessible experience.

**ITEMS INCLUDED IN THIS BUNDLE**
OPUS: Echo of Starsong, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Complete Soundtrack, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Artbook, OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script
<!--image-->
![OPUS Echo of Starsong-17449](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b7df2ea1a5624166af9dbde0ca3d1c88/opus-echo-of-starsong-17449.gif)
